inclusion.criterion: Clinical symptoms of lumbar spinal stenosis (pseudoclaudication)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: complaining of scoliosis and back pain

inclusion.criterion: MRI with finding of LSS at 1-3 lumbar levels
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: scoliotic curve is measured as 45 degree

inclusion.criterion: The surgical treatment to be provided is decompression alone
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: surgical treatment to be provided is decompression alone

inclusion.criterion: The patient has given oral and written informed consent to the participation in the study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: has given oral and written informed consent

exclusion.criterion: Symptomatic osteoarthritis in the lower limbs that affects and limits their function
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a well-dressed and well-nourished adolescent who is alert and cooperative. The left shoulder is slightly higher than the right shoulder.
